basic.floral_language:
Rhododendron hirsutum
Floriography: open and bright, pure, happy 
Rhododendron hirsutum is beautiful and is called a fame as the "flower of xi shi ”, which was a very pretty lady in ancient China". It is also Taipei city flower. 
Rhododendron hirsutum blossoms clustered, pattern is diverse, and color is gorgeous. Traditional azalea has only 5 petals, and stamen and pistil protrude from the middle of flower, like a smaller version of the lilies. Azalea is often used as interior decoration or courtyard. 
Rhododendron hirsutum like mild sunshine, natural flowering is from April to June, with ornamental period up to 3-4 weeks. After flowers die, cut withered flowers and leaves, waiting for the bud spouting again in the coming year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, avoid strong light, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water in the evening during summer, water thoroughly every 4-5 days in spring, reduce watering in winter, keep soil moist in other time
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 2-3 times monthly in the growing season
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
